newsitem.title: USA: Kings Road says CEO Friedman fights cancer.
newsitem.headline: Kings Road says CEO Friedman fights cancer.

text.p: Kings Road Entertainment Inc, a film production and distribution company, said Tuesday its chairman and chief executive officer Stephen Friedman has been diagnosed with myeloma, a form of cancer, and has undergone aggressive treatment.
In a written statement, the company did not offer any further details about his health or his current working relationship with the company.
A spokesman was not immediately available for comment.
